title: AshAxiom Academy
hero_desc: Your interactive path to mastering higher mathematics and financial analysis via an intelligent Python framework.
card_guide_desc: 22 lessons across 4 levels: from fundamentals to quantum market analysis.
card_practice_desc: Real-world cases: Intel vs AMD spreads, BTC volatility, and Taylor magic.
footer_text: Â© 2025 AshAxiom Academy | Engineered by Ashraf Rasulov for the global community.
lvl1_desc: Framework fundamentals: initialization, method chaining (Piping), and multi-format data export.
lvl2_desc: Master 2D and 3D rendering with automated time-series synchronization and custom styling.
lvl3_desc: Solve complex problems via experts: Zorich limits, Krasnov geometry, and Parallel Fourier series.
lvl4_desc: The system's peak: combining Murphy's laws, Satoshi's models, and 3D Taylor forecasting.
